articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Protests escalate in Bangladesh after death of student leader Hadi - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Thousands rally nationwide, calling for justice for Hadi, whose death intensifies anti-Indian sentiment in Bangladesh.
articles.content: Demonstrators gathered throughout Bangladesh for a second consecutive day demanding justice for Sharif Osman Hadi, a prominent figure in last years pro-democracy movement who died Thursday in a Singa… [+3027 chars]
